author: Microsoft
name: Background Task
description: This creates an in-process background task.  This will allow you to run code even while the app is not in the foreground.  The in-process model enhances the application lifecycle with improved notifications for when your app is in the foreground or in the background.\nTo find out more about in-process background tasks, head to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/launch-resume/create-and-register-an-inproc-background-task.
